duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead development of cGMP Application for Facilitation of Audit Actions.
Build IBM MQ Listener to read the data from WMS.
Indicate Audit Required in Customer Account Requirement Entry based on the Audit required flag from Account Management Screen.
Display dynamic Audit button on Operations Order Detail Report to capture the audit response for all the Warehouse service offerings associated with Order number and account number.
Display only Selected offering tied to the account instead of all offerings in the Audit capture Screen.
Operations Order Detail Report Audit capture Screen will be accessible to single users and display the active Auditor for other users.
